page.title: 18A SUNDAY IN CARLISLE
page.content: I usually get up at about 10.30.My breakfast is usually a cereal,a cup of tea and two pieces of toast.I some- times go out to play on a bike or help my dad in the garden.If dad is at home we have our big meal at lunchtime,but if he is at work we have it at teatime We usually have chicken,lamb or beef. I help my mam to wash up the dishes. When we have done that we watch tele- vision.Then we go to my nanna's,have tea,and walk by the River Eden.You can see different types of birds flying by the river,ducks and even geese.We come back to my nanna's and have our tea.It is usually a packet of crisps and some jelly and fresh cream.After we have had our tea we come away and when we get home I have a bath.Then I have a drink of tea and go to bed.
